verbose_text: Moreover, when siRNA transfection was employed to knockdown Col4a5 expression in BMMs, which was confirmed by both RT-qPCR and western blot analysis (XREF_FIG), Col4a5 knockdown led to an approximately 40-80% decrease in MTB numbers recovered from the host cells 6 h post-infection under nutrient enriched or starvation conditions (XREF_FIG).
